SELECT distinct m.menu_id,m.menu_descr,m.menu_url,m.is_leaf, m.menu_pid,p.privilege_id,p.privilege_type FROM t_menu_privilege mp,t_sys_menu m,t_privilege p,t_user_role r WHERE mp.privilege_id=p.privilege_id and mp.role_id=r.role_id and mp.menu_id=m.menu_id and m.menu_pid = 0 and r.user_id=#{userId} order by m.menu_id
